about.title: About SnapThePlant
about.p1: SnapThePlant is your digital companion for exploring the natural world. Our mission is to make the identification of plants, insects, trees, and weeds as simple as taking a picture.
about.p2: Whether you're a curious gardener, a hiking enthusiast, or a student of biology, our app provides quick and informative results to help you learn more about the life that surrounds you.
about.p3: This project is driven by a passion for nature and technology. We are constantly working to improve our identification accuracy and expand our database. Thank you for being a part of our community!

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.p1: The identifications provided by SnapThePlant are generated by an artificial intelligence model and are intended for informational and educational purposes only. While we strive for high accuracy, the results may not always be correct.
disclaimer.p2: Never use this application for identifying plants or fungi for consumption or for medical purposes. Misidentification could lead to serious health risks, including poisoning. Always consult with a qualified human expert before eating any wild plant.
disclaimer.p3: The creators of SnapThePlant are not liable for any damages or harm resulting from the use or misuse of the information provided by this application. By using this app, you agree to these terms.

community.title: Welcome to the Community!
community.description: A place to connect, share, and learn together.

forums.title: Forums
forums.description: Share your findings, ask questions, and discuss with fellow nature enthusiasts.

submissions.title: User Submissions
submissions.description: Submit new findings and help expand our database for everyone to use.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Work with others to verify identifications and build a trusted knowledge base.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon!
comingSoon.description: We are hard at work building these features. Stay tuned for updates!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.p1: Your privacy is important to us. It is SnapThePlant's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our application.
privacy.p2: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used. This includes your email and display name for account purposes, and any images you upload for identification.
privacy.p3: We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification. The images you upload are processed by our AI and may be stored temporarily for analysis and to improve our service.
privacy.p4: We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law. Our app may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies. You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services.
